alert.note: Alert for Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 05 at 4:40AM PST until January 05 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, north winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For the High Wind Watch, northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 10 AM PST this morning. For the High Wind Watch, from Saturday evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor
